item.title: Personal Website Workshop
item.description: Prerequisites Basic Unix terminal commands Basic Git knowledge (add, commit, push, submodules) Familiarity with Markdown syntax Resources Git Tutorial (~15min) Git Tutorial (~1h) Markdown Basic Syntax Basic Terminal Commands Papermod Documentation Getting Started Install Code Editor: VScode, Pycharm Install Package Manager: Homebrew /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)" Install Static Site Generator Hugo brew install hugo Follow the directions on the terminal output Install Github CLI (if you want to deploy your website)
